document_data.name: Whitesteel
document_data.mainbody: '''Whitesteel''', noted by [[Elminster]] to be named '''tungsten''' on other worlds, was a rare metal found in small deposits in the [[Earthfast Mountains]].
document_data.Properties: Whitesteel weighed {{SI|1205|pound|k|long=yes}} per {{SI|1|cubic foot|l|long=yes}}, making it one of the heaviest metals alongside [[gold]] and [[platinum]].{{Cite dragon/13/How Heavy Is My Giant|6}} It was grayish-white in color.
document_data.Applications: Although an unusual choice of material, whitesteel was known to be used in the creation of magic [[ring]]s. One such item was a ''[[ring of wizardry]]'' created by the [[fire]]-specializing [[wizard]] [[Nill|Nill the Infernal]] over a period of five years.
